00071     public CreateTable(Vector<Object[]> tableDataIn){
00072         this(tableDataIn, new Object[0][0], new Object[0][0]);
00073         this.columnNamesObj = defaultColumnNames(tableDataIn.size());
00074         this.tableOptions = defaultOptions();
00075     }

00093     public CreateTable(Vector<Object[]> tableDataIn, Object[][] colNamesIn,
00094             Object[][] tableOptionsIn) {
00095         super();
00096         
00097         
00098         // Set the parent class variables to the variables used in the constructor
00099         columnNamesObj = colNamesIn;
00100         tableData = tableDataIn;
00101         tableOptions = tableOptionsIn;
00102                       
00103         newTableModel.setModelData(tableData, retrieveColumnNames(), editableColumns());
00104         
00105         super.setModel(newTableModel);
00106         
00107         int optionsLength = tableOptions.length;
00108         try {
00109             for(int i=0; i < optionsLength; i++) {
00110                 String thisString = tableOptions[i][0].toString();
00111                 if(thisString.equals("dimensionInPixels")){
00112                     if(tableOptions[i][1] instanceof Dimension) {
00113                         super.setPreferredScrollableViewportSize((Dimension)tableOptions[i][1]);
00114                     }
00115                 } else if (thisString.equals("isSortable")){
00116                     if(tableOptions[i][1] instanceof Boolean) {
00117                         if((Boolean)tableOptions[i][1]){
00118                             newSorter = new TableRowSorter<GuiTableModel>(newTableModel);
00119                             super.setRowSorter(newSorter);
00120                         }
00121                     }
00122                 } else if(thisString.equals("isScrollableX")){
00123                     if(tableOptions[i][1] instanceof Boolean) {
00124                        //(Boolean)tableOptions[i][1]
00125                     }
00126                 } else if(thisString.equals("isScrollableY")){
00127                     if(tableOptions[i][1] instanceof Boolean) {
00128                         //(Boolean)tableOptions[i][1]
00129                     }
00130                 } else if(thisString.equals("isFillViewport")){
00131                     if(tableOptions[i][1] instanceof Boolean) {
00132                         super.setFillsViewportHeight((Boolean)tableOptions[i][1]);
00133                     }
00134                 } else if(thisString.equals("isSingleSelection")){
00135                     if(tableOptions[i][1] instanceof Boolean) {
00136                         if((Boolean)tableOptions[i][1]){
00137                             super.setSelectionMode(ListSelectionModel.SINGLE_SELECTION);
00138                         }
00139                     }
00140                 } /*else if(thisString.equals("isFilterable")){
00141                     if(tableOptions[i][1] instanceof javax.swing.JTextField) {
00142                         super.setSelectionMode(ListSelectionModel.SINGLE_SELECTION);
00143                         
00144                     }
00145                 }*/
00146             }
00147         } catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
00148             System.out.println("Error: " + e);
00149         }
00150         
00151         int colLength = columnNamesObj.length;
00152         try {
00153             for(int i=0; i < colLength; i++) {
00154                 if(columnNamesObj[i][1] instanceof Boolean){
00155                     if((Boolean)columnNamesObj[i][1]){
00156                         // Set that column or that column's cells to be editable
00157                         //super.set
00158                     }
00159                 }
00160             }
00161         } catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
00162             System.out.println("Error: " + e);
00163         }    
00164     }

00167     public void addObject(Object[] newRow){
00168         Vector<Object[]> currentData = newTableModel.getModelData();
00169         currentData.add(newRow);
00170         newTableModel.setChangedData(currentData);
00171     }
00172     
00173     public String[] retrieveColumnNames() {
00174         
00175         int objArrayLength = columnNamesObj.length;
00176         String[] columnNamesString = new String[objArrayLength];
00177         
00178         // Not as elegant as it could be but it should still work
00179         for(int i=0; i<objArrayLength; i++) {
00180             if(columnNamesObj[i][0] instanceof String){
00181                 columnNamesString[i] = (String)columnNamesObj[i][0];
00182             }
00183         }        
00184         return columnNamesString;
00185    }
00186     
00187     private int[] editableColumns() {
00188         //There's probably a MUCH better way to do this but I'll have to think about it
00189         
00190         int[] edColsInt;
00191         int edColsCounter = 0;
00192         int edColsPlacement = 0;
00193 
00194         // Determine the length that the array we're going to return has to be.
00195         // I'm doing it in an array b/c I'm used to Perl, in which arrays don't
00196         // totally suck like they apparently do in Java.
00197         for(int i=0; i<columnNamesObj.length; i++) {
00198             if(columnNamesObj[i][1] instanceof Boolean){
00199                 if((Boolean)columnNamesObj[i][1]){
00200                     edColsCounter++;
00201                 }
00202             }
00203         }
00204         
00205         // Initialize the edColsInt array now that we know the length
00206         edColsInt = new int[edColsCounter];
00207 
00208         // Now that we have an array to return, re-cycle through the object array
00209         // and populate the edColsInt array with the column #'s to be editable
00210         for(int i=0; i<columnNamesObj.length; i++) {
00211             if(columnNamesObj[i][1] instanceof Boolean){
00212                 if((Boolean)columnNamesObj[i][1]){
00213                     edColsInt[edColsPlacement] = i;
00214                     edColsPlacement++;
00215                 }
00216             }
00217         }
00218         
00219         return edColsInt;
00220     }
00221     
00222     private Object[][] defaultColumnNames(int arraySize) {
00223         Object[][] dCN = new Object[arraySize][2];
00224         for(int i=0; i<arraySize; i++) {
00225             dCN[i][0] = "Column #" + i;
00226             dCN[i][1] = new Boolean(false);
00227         }
00228         return dCN;
00229     }
00230     
00231     private Object[][] columnNamesStrToObj(String[] colNamesStr){
00232         // Also here, probably a better way to do this but this is how I know
00233         Object[][] oA = new Object[colNamesStr.length][2];
00234         for(int i=0; i<colNamesStr.length; i++){
00235             oA[i][0] = colNamesStr[i];
00236             oA[i][1] = new Boolean(false);
00237         }
00238         return oA;
00239     }
00240     
00241     private Object[][] defaultOptions(){
00242         Object[][] tO = {
00243             {"dimensionInPixels", new Dimension(500, 70)},
00244             {"isSortable", new Boolean(true)},
00245             {"isScrollableX", new Boolean(false)},
00246             {"isScrollableY", new Boolean(false)},
00247             {"isFillViewport", new Boolean(true)},
00248             {"isSingleSelection", new Boolean(true)}
00249         };
00250         return tO;
00251     }

00254     public void setFilterField(JTextField jTF, Document filterDocument) {
00255         filterField = jTF;
00256         //System.out.println("Filtering Document: " + filterDocument.TitleProperty);
00257         filterDocument.addDocumentListener(
00258             new DocumentListener() {
00259                 public void changedUpdate(DocumentEvent e) {
00260                     newFilter();
00261                 }
00262                 public void insertUpdate(DocumentEvent e) {
00263                     newFilter();
00264                 }
00265                 public void removeUpdate(DocumentEvent e) {
00266                     newFilter();
00267                 }
00268         });
00269     }
00270     
00271     private void newFilter() {
00272         RowFilter<GuiTableModel, java.lang.Object> rf = null;
00273         //If current expression doesn't parse, don't update.
00274         if(filterField != null){
00275             try {
00276                 // Case sensitive, which is less than ideal, but difficult to fix here
00277                 rf = RowFilter.regexFilter(filterField.getText(), filterByColumn);
00278             } catch (java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException e) {
00279                 System.err.println("Error in CreateTable.newFilter(): " + e);
00280                 return;
00281             }
00282             try {
00283                 newSorter.setRowFilter(rf);
00284             } catch(Exception e) {
00285                 System.err.println("Error in CreateTable.newFilter(): " +
00286                         "newsorter.setRowFilter threw exception:\n" + e);
00287             }
00288         }
00289     }
00290     
00291     public void filterColumnSelectionEvent(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
00292         if(evt.getSource() instanceof JComboBox) {
00293                 JComboBox cb = (JComboBox)evt.getSource();
00294                 if(cb.getSelectedIndex() > -1) {
00295                     filterByColumn = cb.getSelectedIndex();
00296                 }
00297         }
00298     }
